title: Was Going to Buy Urfwick When had enough Essence
body: Hi Riot, i was going to buy Urfwick today. But didn't notice he left the store. When did you's take him out? And could you possibly answer me i am confused. Been away on vacation for a week. Before i could pick him up.

replies.body: Heya, Urfwick was exclusive to the [Essence Emporium](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088-The-Essence-Emporium-FAQ).  This shop was only around for a short period during the preseason after converting IP to BE.  The BE shop will return, though, I cannot make any guarantees for what content would be made available.  It's too late to grab Urfwick now, but keep your eyes on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should something come up.  Sorry!
